_comment: STL calibration offsets for Thor robot visualization

_usage.offset: [x, y, z] translation in mm applied in STL local frame before FK transform
_usage.rotation: [rx, ry, rz] Euler angles in degrees (XYZ order) applied before FK transform
_usage.scale: Scale factor (1.0 = no scaling). Use if STL is in different units

_note: All STLs were exported with centers around [128, 128, z]. Offsets re-center them to joint axes.
